EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

ExploratoryWellsDrilledNetProductive.label: Oil and Gas, Exploratory Well Drilled, Net Productive, Number
ExploratoryWellsDrilledNetProductive.description: Number of exploratory oil and gas wells capable of producing either oil or gas in sufficient quantity to justify completion as oil or gas well.

ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.label: Extensions, Discoveries, Additions and Improved Recovery, Less Related Costs
ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Cash Inflows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Development Costs
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in developing proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Net Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount, after future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Production Costs
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in producing proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Ten Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of discount on future accumulated cash inflow, after deducting future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves, using a discount rate of ten percent a year.

IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.label: Changes in Estimated Future Development Costs
IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in estimated future development costs.

NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncur.label: Previously Estimated Development Costs Incurred
PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncur.description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of previously estimated development costs incurred.

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveExte.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Extension and Discovery (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveExte.description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from the extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered reservoir or discovery of new field with proved reserve or of new reservoir of proved reserve in old field, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetE.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Net (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetE.description: Energy measure of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProd.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Production (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProd.description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from production, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveRevi.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Revision of Previous Estimate (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveRevi.description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas related to revision of a previous estimate resulting from new information, except for an increase in proved acreage, or change in economic factors, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1.label: Proved Developed Reserves (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1.description: Energy measure of interests in proved developed reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1.label: Proved Undeveloped Reserves (Energy)
ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1.description: Energy measure of proved undeveloped reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Accretion of Discount
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of accretion of discount for the standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow related to proved oil and gas reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccountsReceivableNet.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies.label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies
AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies.description: Total costs accrued as of the balance sheet date for environmental loss contingencies.

AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

AssetRetirementObligation.label: Asset Retirement Obligation
AssetRetirementObligation.description: The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

AssetRetirementObligationLegallyRestrict.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Legally Restricted Assets, Fair Value
AssetRetirementObligationLegallyRestrict.description: Carrying amount of an asset that is legally restricted for purposes of settling an asset retirement obligation.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Settled
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.

AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Revision of Estimate
AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset retirement obligation from changes in the amount or timing of the estimated cash flows associated with the settlement of the obligation.

AssetRetirementObligationsNoncurrent.label: Asset Retirement Obligations, Noncurrent
AssetRetirementObligationsNoncurrent.description: Noncurrent portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.label: Capital Expenditures Incurred but Not yet Paid
CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.description: Future cash outflow to pay for purchases of fixed assets that have occurred.

CapitalizedCostsAccumulatedDepreciationD.label: Capitalized Costs, Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion, Amortization and Valuation Allowance Relating to Oil and Gas Producing Activities
CapitalizedCostsAccumulatedDepreciationD.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and valuation allowance relating to oil and gas producing activities.

CapitalizedCostsMineralInterestsInProved.label: Capitalized Costs, Mineral Interests in Proved Properties
CapitalizedCostsMineralInterestsInProved.description: Capitalized costs of proved properties that include fee ownership or a lease, concession, or other interest representing the right to extract oil or gas subject to such terms as may be imposed by the conveyance of that interest.

CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Gross
CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.description: The sum of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities before accounting for accumulated depreciation.

CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Net
CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.description: Net amount of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities.

CapitalizedCostsProvedProperties.label: Capitalized Costs, Proved Properties
CapitalizedCostsProvedProperties.description: Capitalized costs of proved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions; wells and related equipment; support equipment and facilities; and uncompleted wells and equipment and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

CapitalizedCostsSupportEquipmentAndFacil.label: Capitalized Costs, Support Equipment and Facilities
CapitalizedCostsSupportEquipmentAndFacil.description: Capitalized costs incurred for support equipment and facilities used in oil and gas producing activities (such as seismic equipment, drilling equipment, construction and grading equipment, vehicles, repair shops, warehouses, supply points, camps, and division, district, or field offices).

CapitalizedCostsUncompletedWellsEquipmen.label: Capitalized Costs, Uncompleted Wells, Equipment and Facilities
CapitalizedCostsUncompletedWellsEquipmen.description: Capitalized costs of which include those incurred to (1) drill and equip wells that are not yet completed (2) acquire or construct equipment and facilities that are not yet installed.

CapitalizedCostsUnprovedProperties.label: Capitalized Costs, Unproved Properties
CapitalizedCostsUnprovedProperties.description: Capitalized costs of unproved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

CapitalizedCostsWellsAndRelatedEquipment.label: Capitalized Costs, Wells and Related Equipment and Facilities
CapitalizedCostsWellsAndRelatedEquipment.description: Capitalized costs which include those incurred to (1) to drill and equip those exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells that have found proved reserves and (2) obtain access to proved reserves and provide facilities for extracting, treating, gathering, storing the oil and gas, including the drilling and equipping of development wells and development-type stratigraphic wells and service wells.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashFlowHedgeDerivativeInstrumentAssetsA.label: Cash Flow Hedge Derivative Instrument Assets at Fair Value
CashFlowHedgeDerivativeInstrumentAssetsA.description: Fair value of all asset derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

CashFlowHedgeDerivativeInstrumentLiabili.label: Cash Flow Hedge Derivative Instrument Liabilities at Fair Value
CashFlowHedgeDerivativeInstrumentLiabili.description: Fair value of all liability derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

CashUninsuredAmount.label: Cash, Uninsured Amount
CashUninsuredAmount.description: The amount of cash as of the balance sheet date that is not insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Exercise Price of Warrants or Rights
ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.description: Exercise price per share or per unit of warrants or rights outstanding.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Outstanding
ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightUnissued.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Unissued
ClassOfWarrantOrRightUnissued.description: The number of warrants or rights which entitle the entity to receive future services in exchange for the unvested, forfeitable warrants or rights.

CostDepreciationAmortizationAndDepletion.label: Cost, Depreciation, Amortization and Depletion
CostDepreciationAmortizationAndDepletion.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives, and reduction in quantity of natural resource due to consumption directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

CostOfGoodsSoldDepreciationDepletionAndA.label: Cost of Goods Sold, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfGoodsSoldDepreciationDepletionAndA.description: Aggregate depreciation, depletion and amortization expense in the current period for the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets directly related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

CostsAndExpenses.label: Costs and Expenses
CostsAndExpenses.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Oil and Gas Properties
CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.description: Cost incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in acquisition of oil and gas properties.

CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Oil and Gas Properties with Proved Reserves
CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have proved reserves.

CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfUnprovedOilAnd.label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Unproved Oil and Gas Properties
CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfUnprovedOilAnd.description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have unproved reserves.

CostsIncurredDevelopmentCosts.label: Costs Incurred, Development Costs
CostsIncurredDevelopmentCosts.description: Development costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

DecreaseDueToSalesOfMineralsInPlace.label: Decrease Due to Sales of Minerals in Place
DecreaseDueToSalesOfMineralsInPlace.description: Amount of decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales of minerals in place.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DerivativeAssetsCurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Current
DerivativeAssetsCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Noncurrent
DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Fair Value, Net
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet.description: Fair value of the assets less the liabilities of a derivative or group of derivatives.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Current
DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Noncurrent
DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid
DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

DueFromAffiliateCurrent.label: Due from Affiliate, Current
DueFromAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueToAffiliateCurrent.label: Due to Affiliate, Current
DueToAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

ExploratoryWellsDrilledNetProductive.label: Exploratory Wells Drilled, Net Productive
ExploratoryWellsDrilledNetProductive.description: The number of productive exploratory wells drilled in the geographic area. A productive well is a well that is not a dry well. The number of wells drilled refers to the number of wells (holes) completed at any time during the fiscal years, regardless when drilling was initiated.

ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.label: Extensions, Discoveries, Additions and Improved Recovery, Less Related Costs
ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Cash Inflows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Development Costs
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in developing proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Net Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount, after future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Production Costs
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in producing proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Ten Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of discount on future accumulated cash inflow, after deducting future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves, using a discount rate of ten percent a year.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets for Financial Service Operations
GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GeneralPartnerDistributions.label: General Partner Distributions
GeneralPartnerDistributions.description: Distributions from earnings to the general partner of a partnership included in the consolidated financial statements.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GeneralPartnersShareOfUndistributedEarni.label: General Partner's Share of Undistributed Earnings, Incentive Distribution Right Embedded in General Partner Interest
GeneralPartnersShareOfUndistributedEarni.description: Amount of undistributed earnings allocated to the general partner (as if the undistributed earnings were available cash) when the incentive distribution right is embedded in the general partner's interest. Depending on the structure of the master limited partnership, the incentive distribution right may be a separate class of non-voting limited partner interest that the general partner holds but generally may sell of transfer apart from its overall interest.

ImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties.label: Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties.description: The expense recorded to reduce the value of oil and gas assets consisting of proved properties and unproved properties as the estimate of future successful production from these properties is reduced.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsNetOfT.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsNetOfT.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Other Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) in obligations owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.label: Changes in Estimated Future Development Costs
IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in estimated future development costs.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due within one year (or one operating cycle) from all parties, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

IncreaseDueToPurchasesOfMineralsInPlace.label: Increase Due to Purchases of Minerals in Place
IncreaseDueToPurchasesOfMineralsInPlace.description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of purchases of minerals in place.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersOfferingCosts.label: Limited Partners' Offering Costs
LimitedPartnersOfferingCosts.description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the limited partners.

LongTermPurchaseCommitmentAmount.label: Long-term Purchase Commitment, Amount
LongTermPurchaseCommitmentAmount.description: The minimum amount the entity agreed to spend under the long-term purchase commitment.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueCurre.label: Loss Contingency, Accrual, Current
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueCurre.description: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueNoncu.label: Loss Contingency, Accrual, Noncurrent
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueNoncu.description: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OilAndGasSalesRevenue.label: Oil and Gas Sales Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasSalesRevenue.description: Revenue from the sale of oil and gas during the period.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.label: Partners' Capital Account, Private Placement of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a private placement.

PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSaleOfUnits.description: Total units issued during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PaymentsForCommissions.label: Payments for Commissions
PaymentsForCommissions.description: The amount of cash paid for commissions during the current period.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Productive Assets
PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from purchases, sales and disposals of property, plant and equipment and other productive assets, including intangibles.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a controlling interest in another entity or an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncur.label: Previously Estimated Development Costs Incurred
PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncur.description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of previously estimated development costs incurred.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveExte.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Extension and Discovery (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveExte.description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from the extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered reservoir or discovery of new field with proved reserve or of new reservoir of proved reserve in old field, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetE.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Net (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetE.description: Energy measure of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProd.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Production (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProd.description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from production, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservePurc.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Purchase of Mineral in Place (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservePurc.description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from purchase of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveRevi.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Revision of Previous Estimate (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveRevi.description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas related to revision of a previous estimate resulting from new information, except for an increase in proved acreage, or change in economic factors, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesSal.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Sale of Mineral in Place (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesSal.description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from sale of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1.label: Proved Developed Reserves (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1.description: Energy measure of interests in proved developed reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1.label: Proved Undeveloped Reserves (Energy)
ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1.description: Energy measure of proved undeveloped reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.label: Results of Operations, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, and Valuation Provisions
ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.description: Depreciation, depletion and amortization, and valuation provisions (impairments) related to oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.label: Results of Operations, Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.description: Costs related to the impairment of oil and gas properties

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.label: Results of Operations, Income before Income Taxes
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.description: Income before income taxes for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.label: Results of Operations, Production or Lifting Costs
ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.description: Production (lifting) costs from oil and gas producing activities, including but not limited to lease operating expense, production and ad valorem taxes, and transportation expense.

ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.label: Results of Operations, Revenue from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.description: Total revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Accretion of Discount
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of accretion of discount for the standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow related to proved oil and gas reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

UnbilledContractsReceivable.label: Unbilled Contracts Receivable
UnbilledContractsReceivable.description: Unbilled amounts due for services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the entity and, at a minimum, one other party. An example would be amounts associated with contracts or programs where the recognized revenue for performance thereunder exceeds the amounts billed under the terms thereof as of the date of the balance sheet.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipAndGene.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership and General Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipAndGene.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership and general partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership and general partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Includes, for example, the number of units distributed to unit holders whereby unit holders have the ability to elect to receive the unit holders' entire distribution in cash or units of equivalent value or there is a potential limitation on the total amount of cash that all unit holders can elect to receive in aggregate.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.label: Weighted Average Number of Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
